title: Are You in the House Alone?

sources.title: Are You In The House Alone( 1978)
sources.description: WARNING: IMPLICATIONS OF SEXUAL VIOLENCE AND SEXUAL ASSAULT! A teenage girl is harassed by a stalker who torments her with threatening notes and phone calls.

sources.title: Are You In The House Alone 1978
sources.description: After a burglary, a family moves home only for the teenage daughter to start being tormented by strange letters and sinister phone calls. She decides to use her photography skills to catch the stalker before it's too late.

metadata.Plot: Teenage girl is plagued by harassing phone calls. Her fear mounts when she's babysitting at a neighbor's home one evening and the caller rings her at that number.
metadata.Actors: Kathleen Beller, Blythe Danner, Tony Bill
